summary.span: 提供有關目前環境和平台的資訊，以及操作的方法。

span.span: Provides information about, and means to manipulate, the current environment and platform.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來擷取資訊，例如命令列引數，結束代碼、 環境變數設定、 呼叫堆疊，時間的內容自上次系統開機，以及 common language runtime 的版本。Use the class to retrieve information such as command-line arguments, the exit code, environment variable settings, contents of the call stack, time since last system boot, and the version of the common language runtime. ## Examples 下列範例會示範顯示目前環境的相關資訊的清單。The following example demonstrates displays a list of information about the current environment. [!code-cpp[environment.class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.class/CPP/env0.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.class/CS/env0.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.class/VB/env0.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得這個處理程序的命令列。

span.span: Gets the command line for this process.

value.span: 含有命令列引數的字串。

span.span: A string containing command-line arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性提供的存取權的程序名稱和目前的處理序啟動時，在命令列上指定任何引數。This property provides access to the program name and any arguments specified on the command line when the current process was started. 程式名稱可以包含路徑資訊，但不需要執行這項操作。The program name can include path information, but is not required to do so. 使用方法來擷取命令列資訊剖析，並儲存在字串陣列。Use the method to retrieve the command-line information parsed and stored in an array of strings. 未設定的命令列的緩衝區大小上限指定的數字字元。Windows 作業系統的電腦上執行而有所不同。The maximum size of the command-line buffer is not set to a specific number of characters; it varies depending on the Windows operating system that is running on the computer. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示命令列。The following example displays its own command line. [!code-cpp[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/CPP/commandline.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/CS/commandline.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/VB/commandline.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定目前工作目錄的完整路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified path of the current working directory.

value.span: 含有目錄路徑的字串。

span.span: A string containing a directory path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據定義，此程序啟動的本機目錄的根目錄或網路磁碟機中，如果這個屬性的值是後面接著結尾的斜線的磁碟機名稱 (例如，"c:\\")。By definition, if this process starts in the root directory of a local or network drive, the value of this property is the drive name followed by a trailing slash (for example, "C:\\"). 如果此程序啟動的子目錄中，這個屬性的值會是磁碟機和子目錄，不含路徑結尾的斜線 (例如，"C:\mySubDirectory")。If this process starts in a subdirectory, the value of this property is the drive and subdirectory path, without a trailing slash (for example, "C:\mySubDirectory"). ## Examples 下列範例會示範設定屬性。The following example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-cpp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CPP/Vars1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CS/Vars1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/VB/Vars1.vb#4)]

param.name: exitCode
param.span: 要傳回作業系統的結束代碼。

span.span: The exit code to return to the operating system.

param.span: 使用 0 (零) 表示處理程序已順利完成。

span.span: Use 0 (zero) to indicate that the process completed successfully.

summary.span: 結束這個處理序，並傳回結束代碼給作業系統。

span.span: Terminates this process and returns an exit code to the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如`exitCode`參數，使用非零值表示錯誤。For the `exitCode` parameter, use a non-zero number to indicate an error. 應用程式中，您可以列舉型別，定義您自己的錯誤代碼，並傳回適當的錯誤程式碼為基礎。In your application, you can define your own error codes in an enumeration, and return the appropriate error code based on the scenario. 例如，傳回值為 1，指出所需的檔案不存在，，值為 2，表示檔案是格式錯誤。For example, return a value of 1 to indicate that the required file is not present, and a value of 2 to indicate that the file is in the wrong format. 如需 Windows 作業系統所使用的結束代碼的清單，請參閱[系統錯誤碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381.aspx)Windows 文件中。For a list of exit codes used by the Windows operating system, see [System Error Codes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381.aspx) in the Windows documentation. 呼叫方法與使用您的程式語言`return`陳述式如下：Calling the method differs from using your programming language's `return` statement in the following ways: - 一定會終止應用程式。 always terminates an application. 使用`return`陳述式可能會結束應用程式，只有當它用於在應用程式的進入點，例如`Main`方法。Using the `return` statement may terminate an application only if it is used in the application entry point, such as in the `Main` method. - 立即結束應用程式，即使其他執行緒正在執行。 terminates an application immediately, even if other threads are running. 如果`return`呼叫陳述式中的應用程式進入點，它會使應用程式終止所有前景執行緒已經都終止之後，才。If the `return` statement is called in the application entry point, it causes an application to terminate only after all foreground threads have terminated. - 呼叫者必須具備權限呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。 requires the caller to have permission to call unmanaged code. `return`陳述式並不會。The `return` statement does not. - 如果從呼叫`try`或`catch`封鎖，請在任何程式碼`finally`區塊不會執行。If is called from a `try` or `catch` block, the code in any `finally` block does not execute. 如果`return`陳述式使用時中的程式碼`finally`區塊並執行。If the `return` statement is used, the code in the `finally` block does execute. - 如果時，會呼叫中的程式碼[限制的執行區域](~/docs/framework/performance/constrained-execution-regions.md)(CER) 正在執行，CER 將不會完成執行。If is called when code in a [constrained execution region](~/docs/framework/performance/constrained-execution-regions.md) (CER) is running, the CER will not complete execution. 如果`return`陳述式，則 CER 完成執行。If the `return` statement is used, the CER completes execution.

summary.span: 取得或設定處理程序的結束代碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the exit code of the process.

value.span: 含有結束代碼的 32 位元帶正負號的整數 (Signed Integer)。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer containing the exit code.

value.span: 預設值為 0 (零)，表示處理程序順利完成。

span.span: The default value is 0 (zero), which indicates that the process completed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Main`方法會傳回`void`，您可以使用這個屬性來設定將會傳回給呼叫的環境的結束代碼。If the `Main` method returns `void`, you can use this property to set the exit code that will be returned to the calling environment. 如果`Main`不會傳回`void`，會忽略這個屬性。If `Main` does not return `void`, this property is ignored. 這個屬性的初始值為零。The initial value of this property is zero. > [!WARNING] > 屬性是帶正負號的 32 位元整數。The property is a signed 32-bit integer. 若要防止屬性傳回非負數的結束代碼，您不應該使用值大於或等於 0x80000000。To prevent the property from returning a negative exit code, you should not use values greater than or equal to 0x80000000. 使用非零值表示錯誤。Use a non-zero number to indicate an error. 應用程式中，您可以列舉型別，定義您自己的錯誤代碼，並傳回適當的錯誤程式碼為基礎。In your application, you can define your own error codes in an enumeration, and return the appropriate error code based on the scenario. 例如，傳回值為 1，指出所需的檔案不存在，值為 2，表示檔案是格式錯誤。For example, return a value of 1 to indicate that the required file is not present and a value of 2 to indicate that the file is in the wrong format. 如需 Windows 作業系統所使用的結束代碼的清單，請參閱[系統錯誤碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381\(v=vs.85\))Windows 文件中。For a list of exit codes used by the Windows operating system, see [System Error Codes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381\(v=vs.85\)) in the Windows documentation. ## Examples 以下是名為加倍整數值做為命令列引數傳遞給它的 Double.exe 簡單的應用程式。The following is a simple app named Double.exe that doubles an integer value passed to it as a command-line argument. 值會指派至錯誤代碼屬性來指出錯誤情況。The value assigns error codes to the property to indicate error conditions. 請注意，您必須新增若要成功編譯範例 System.Numerics.dll 組件的參考。Note that you must add a reference to the System.Numerics.dll assembly to successfully compile the example. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.ExitCode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/cs/double.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.ExitCode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/vb/double.vb#1)] 此範例可以再叫用批次檔中，如下所示，可藉由使用的可存取其錯誤碼`ERRORLEVEL`命令。The example can then be invoked from a batch file such as the following, which makes its error codes accessible by using the `ERRORLEVEL` command. ``` echo off Double.exe %1 If errorlevel 1639 goto NoArg if errorlevel 534 goto Overflow if errorlevel 160 goto BadArg if errorlevel 0 echo Completed Successfully goto :EOF :NoArg echo Missing argument goto :EOF : Overflow echo Arithmetic overflow goto :EOF :BadArg echo Invalid argument goto :EOF ``` 以下顯示某些產生叫用的批次檔的範例輸出。The following shows some sample output produced by invoking the batch file. ```Output >getdouble 123>echo offResult: 246Completed Successfully>getdouble 5912323109093>echo offArithmetic overflow>getdouble>echo offMissing argument>getdouble "a string">echo offInvalid argument ``` Double.exe 是與下列範例中，函式相同，不同之處在於前者會定義名為進入點，請注意該程式碼`Main`，具有沒有傳回值，而這個範例會定義名為的進入點`Main`，傳回一個整數。Note that code for Double.exe is identical in function to the following example, except that the former defines an entry point named `Main` that has no return value, whereas this example defines an entry point named `Main` that returns an integer. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.ExitCode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/cs/double1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.ExitCode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/vb/double1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 用變數值的等值字串來取代內嵌於指定字串內的每個環境變數名稱，然後傳回結果字串。

span.span: Replaces the name of each environment variable embedded in the specified string with the string equivalent of the value of the variable, then returns the resulting string.

returns.span: 由字串值取代每個環境變數的字串。

span.span: A string with each environment variable replaced by its value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks COM interop 用來擷取作業系統的環境變數。COM interop is used to retrieve the environment variables from the operating system. 如果無法擷取環境變數，因為 COM 錯誤，說明失敗的原因的 HRESULT 用以產生其中幾個可能的例外狀況。也就是說，例外狀況的 HRESULT 而定。If the environment variables cannot be retrieved due to a COM error, the HRESULT that explains the cause of the failure is used to generate one of several possible exceptions; that is, the exception depends on the HRESULT. 如需有關 HRESULT 的處理方式的詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 > 一節方法。For more information about how the HRESULT is processed, see the Remarks section of the method. 設定環境變數只會取代發生。Replacement only occurs for environment variables that are set. 例如，假設`name`是"MyENV = %myenv%"。For example, suppose `name` is "MyENV = %MyENV%". 如果設定的環境變數，MyENV，是為 42，則這個方法會傳回"MyENV = 42"。If the environment variable, MyENV, is set to 42, this method returns "MyENV = 42". 如果未設定 MyENV，不會發生變更。這個方法會傳回"MyENV = %myenv%"。If MyENV is not set, no change occurs; this method returns "MyENV = %MyENV%". 傳回值的大小僅限於 32k。The size of the return value is limited to 32K. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得系統磁碟機和系統根變數。The following example shows how to obtain the system drive and system root variables. [!code-cpp[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/CPP/expandenvironmentvariables.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/CS/expandenvironmentvariables.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/VB/expandenvironmentvariables.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結束而不執行任何使用中的處理程序`try` / `finally`區塊或完成項。This method terminates a process without running any active `try`/`finally` blocks or finalizers. 方法寫入`message`Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔的字串會建立您的應用程式的傾印，然後會終止目前的處理序。The method writes the `message` string to the Windows Application event log, creates a dump of your application, and then terminates the current process. `message`字串也會包含在向 Microsoft 回報錯誤。The `message` string is also included in error reporting to Microsoft. 使用方法，而非方法，以結束您的應用程式，如果您的應用程式的狀態已損毀修復，以及執行您的應用程式`try` / `finally`區塊與完成項可能會損毀程式資源。Use the method instead of the method to terminate your application if the state of your application is damaged beyond repair, and executing your application's `try`/`finally` blocks and finalizers will corrupt program resources. 使用 Windows 錯誤報告給 Microsoft 報告資訊。Information is reported to Microsoft by using Windows Error Reporting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows 錯誤報告： 開始使用](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx)。For more information, see [Windows Error Reporting: Getting Started](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx). ## Examples 下列範例會寫入 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔中的記錄項目，並終止目前的處理程序。The following example writes a log entry to the Windows Application event log and terminates the current process. summary.span: 將訊息寫入 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔後立即終止處理程序，然後在向 Microsoft 回報錯誤時，包含該訊息和例外狀況資訊。

span.span: Immediately terminates a process after writing a message to the Windows Application event log, and then includes the message and exception information in error reporting to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結束而不執行任何使用中的程序`try` / `finally`區塊或完成項。This method terminates the process without running any active `try`/`finally` blocks or finalizers. 方法寫入`message`Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔的字串會建立您的應用程式的傾印，然後會終止目前的處理序。The method writes the `message` string to the Windows Application event log, creates a dump of your application, and then terminates the current process. 使用 Windows 錯誤報告給 Microsoft 報告資訊。Information is reported to Microsoft by using Windows Error Reporting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows 錯誤報告： 開始使用](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx)。For more information, see [Windows Error Reporting: Getting Started](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx). 向 Microsoft 回報錯誤包括`message`和`exception`提供用來分類錯誤的詳細資料的資訊。Error reporting to Microsoft includes `message` and `exception` information, which provides details used to classify the error. 雖然`exception`是不會處理因為處理序終止，引發例外狀況的內容資訊仍取得。Although `exception` is not handled because the process is terminated, the contextual information that raised the exception is still obtained. 如果`exception`是`null`，或如果`exception`是此方法不會擲回操作與相同方法多載。If `exception` is `null`, or if `exception` is not thrown, this method operates the same as the method overload. 使用方法，而非方法，以結束您的應用程式，如果您的應用程式的狀態已損毀修復，以及執行您的應用程式`try` / `finally`區塊與完成項可能會損毀程式資源。Use the method instead of the method to terminate your application if the state of your application is damaged beyond repair, and executing your application's `try`/`finally` blocks and finalizers will corrupt program resources.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 傳回字串陣列，包含目前處理程序的命令列引數。

span.span: Returns a string array containing the command-line arguments for the current process.

returns.span: 字串的陣列，其中的每個元素都包含命令列引數。

span.span: An array of string where each element contains a command-line argument.

returns.span: 第一個元素是可執行檔名稱，後面的零或多個元素包含其餘的命令列引數。

span.span: The first element is the executable file name, and the following zero or more elements contain the remaining command-line arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的第一個項目包含了執行中程式的檔案名稱。The first element in the array contains the file name of the executing program. 如果無法使用的檔案名稱，第一個項目是否等於。If the file name is not available, the first element is equal to . 其餘的項目包含命令列上輸入任何其他語彙基元。The remaining elements contain any additional tokens entered on the command line. 程式檔案名稱，但不是需要，包含路徑資訊。The program file name can, but is not required to, include path information. 命令列引數是以空格分隔。Command line arguments are delimited by spaces. 您可以使用雙引號 （"） 將空格包含在引數。You can use double quotation marks (") to include spaces within an argument. 單引號 （'），不過，不提供此功能。The single quotation mark ('), however, does not provide this functionality. 如果雙引號後面兩個或反斜線為偶數，每個進行反斜線組會取代一個反斜線，並移除雙引號。If a double quotation mark follows two or an even number of backslashes, each proceeding backslash pair is replaced with one backslash and the double quotation mark is removed. 如果雙引號後面反斜線，包括只有一個為奇數每一對取代一個反斜線，並移除剩餘的反斜線。不過，在此情況下雙引號不會移除。If a double quotation mark follows an odd number of backslashes, including just one, each preceding pair is replaced with one backslash and the remaining backslash is removed; however, in this case the double quotation mark is not removed. 下表顯示如何命令列引數可以是分隔，並假設`MyApp`為目前執行中應用程式。The following table shows how command line arguments can be delimited, and assumes `MyApp` as the current executing application. |在命令列輸入Input at the command line|產生的命令列引數Resulting command line arguments| |-------------------------------|--------------------------------------| |`MyApp alpha beta`|`MyApp, alpha, beta`| |`MyApp "alpha with spaces" "beta with spaces"`|`MyApp, alpha with spaces, beta with spaces`| |`MyApp 'alpha with spaces' beta`|`MyApp, 'alpha, with, spaces', beta`| |`MyApp \\\alpha \\\\"beta`|`MyApp, \\\alpha, \\beta`| |`MyApp \\\\\"alpha \"beta`|`MyApp, \\"alpha, "beta`| 若要取得命令列以單一字串，請使用屬性。To obtain the command line as a single string, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示應用程式的命令列引數。The following example displays the application's command line arguments. [!code-cpp[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/CPP/getcommandlineargs.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/CS/getcommandlineargs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/VB/getcommandlineargs.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從目前的處理序的環境區塊來擷取環境變數。The method retrieves an environment variable from the environment block of the current process only. 它相當於呼叫方法`target`值。It is equivalent to calling the method with a `target` value of . 目前的處理序的環境區塊包含下列環境變數：The environment block of the current process includes the following environment variables: - 所有個別電腦會在建立程序，以及它們的值所定義的環境變數。All per-machine environment variables that are defined at the time the process is created, along with their values. - 所有當時所定義的每個使用者環境變數建立處理序，以及它們的值。All per-user environment variables that are defined at the time the process is created, along with their values. - 執行此程序時，呼叫的程序區塊加入的任何變數方法或方法`target`值。Any variables added to the process block while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 如果環境變數會建立處理程序啟動之後，您可以使用這個方法來擷取所建立的呼叫這些變數方法或方法`target`的值。。If environment variables are created after the process has started, you can use this method to retrieve only those variables that were created by calling the method or the method with a `target` value of .. 若要擷取所有環境變數與其值，呼叫方法。To retrieve all environment variables along with their values, call the method. 環境變數名稱不區分大小寫。Environment variable names are not case-sensitive. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來擷取`windir`環境變數，其中包含 Windows 目錄的路徑。The following example uses the method to retrieve the `windir` environment variable, which contains the path of the Windows directory. [!code-cpp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CPP/Vars1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CS/Vars1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/VB/Vars1.vb#4)] 下列範例會嘗試擷取名為環境變數的值`Test1`從處理序的環境區塊。The following example attempts to retrieve the value of an environment variable named `Test1` from the process environment block. 如果變數不存在，此範例會建立其與擷取其值。If the variable doesn't exist, the example creates its and retrieves its value. 此範例會顯示變數的值。The example displays the value of the variable. 如果範例已建立變數，它也會呼叫方法的每個成員列舉型別來建立可以擷取只會從目前的處理程序的環境區塊的變數。If the example created the variable, it also calls the method with each member of the enumeration to establish that the variable can be retrieved only from the current process environment block. 最後，如果範例已建立變數，就會刪除它。Finally, if the example created the variable, it deletes it. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/cs/getenvironmentvariableex1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/vb/getenvironmentvariableex1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `target`參數會指定是否要在目前的處理序或從目前的使用者或本機電腦的 Windows 作業系統登錄機碼，擷取環境變數。The `target` parameter specifies whether the environment variable is retrieved from the current process or from the Windows operating system registry key for the current user or local machine. 所有的個別使用者和每台機器的環境變數會自動複製到目前的處理序的環境區塊。All per-user and per-machine environment variables are automatically copied into the environment block of the current process. 不過，環境變數只能加入至目前的處理序的環境區塊保存程序的期間。However, environment variables added only to the environment block of the current process persist only for the duration of the process. 若要擷取所有環境變數與其值，呼叫方法。To retrieve all environment variables along with their values, call the method. 環境變數名稱不區分大小寫。Environment variable names are not case-sensitive. ## Examples 下列範例會建立處理程序、 使用者和電腦目標的環境變數，會檢查作業系統登錄是否包含使用者和電腦的環境變數，然後刪除環境變數。The following example creates environment variables for the Process, User, and Machine targets, checks whether the operating system registry contains the User and Machine environment variables, then deletes the environment variables. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取系統特殊資料夾，例如程式檔案、 程式、 系統或啟動時，可以用來存取通用資訊的路徑。This method retrieves the path to a system special folder, such as Program Files, Programs, System, or Startup, which can be used to access common information. 特殊資料夾依預設會設定系統，或由使用者明確安裝的 Windows 版本時。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. `folder`參數指定要擷取的特殊資料夾，且必須是其中一個值在列舉型別，則為任何其他值會擲回的例外狀況。The `folder` parameter designates the special folder to retrieve and must be one of the values in the enumeration; any other value throws an exception. 如需特殊資料夾的詳細資訊，請參閱[CSIDL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664)值主題。For more information about special folders, see the [CSIDL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664) values topic. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來傳回並顯示相關聯的路徑`folder`參數。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to return and display the path associated with the `folder` parameter. span.span: Gets the path to the system special folder that is identified by the specified enumeration, and uses a specified option for accessing special folders.

returns.span: 如果所指定的系統特殊資料夾實際存在您的電腦中，則為該資料夾的路徑，否則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The path to the specified system special folder, if that folder physically exists on your computer; otherwise, an empty string ("").

returns.span: 如果作業系統沒有建立資料夾、現有資料夾被刪除或資料夾是沒有對應到實體路徑的虛擬目錄 (例如 [我的電腦])，則資料夾不會實際存在。

span.span: A folder will not physically exist if the operating system did not create it, the existing folder was deleted, or the folder is a virtual directory, such as My Computer, which does not correspond to a physical path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取系統特殊資料夾，例如程式檔案、 程式、 系統或啟動時，可以用來存取通用資訊的路徑。This method retrieves the path to a system special folder, such as Program Files, Programs, System, or Startup, which can be used to access common information. 特殊資料夾依預設會設定系統，或由使用者明確安裝的 Windows 版本時。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. `folder`參數指定要擷取的特殊資料夾，且必須是其中一個值在列舉型別，則為任何其他值會擲回的例外狀況。The `folder` parameter designates the special folder to retrieve and must be one of the values in the enumeration; any other value throws an exception. 如需特殊資料夾的詳細資訊，請參閱[CSIDL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664)值主題。For more information about special folders, see the [CSIDL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664) values topic.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示正在卸載目前的應用程式定義域，或是正在關閉通用語言執行平台 (CLR)。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current application domain is being unloaded or the common language runtime (CLR) is shutting down.

value.span: 如果目前的應用程式定義域正在卸載或 CLR 正在關閉，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the current application domain is being unloaded or the CLR is shutting down; otherwise,

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 CLR 卸載應用程式定義域時，它會有完成項方法，該應用程式定義域中的所有物件上執行完成項。When the CLR unloads an application domain, it runs the finalizers on all objects that have a finalizer method in that application domain. CLR 關閉時，其會啟動完成項執行緒上完成項方法的所有物件。When the CLR shuts down, it starts the finalizer thread on all objects that have a finalizer method. 屬性會傳回`true`只完成項執行緒已經啟動。The property returns `true` only after the finalizer thread has been started. 當屬性傳回`true`，您可以決定應用程式定義域正在卸載或 CLR 本身關閉藉由呼叫方法。When the property returns `true`, you can determine whether an application domain is being unloaded or the CLR itself is shutting down by calling the method. 這個方法會傳回`true`因為應用程式定義域正在卸載，如果呼叫完成項或`false`如果 CLR 正在關閉。This method returns `true` if finalizers are called because the application domain is unloading or `false` if the CLR is shutting down. 屬性會傳回`false`完成項執行緒尚未啟動。The property returns `false` if the finalizer thread has not been started. 您可以藉由使用這個屬性，判斷是否要存取您的最終處理程式碼中的靜態變數。By using this property, you can determine whether to access static variables in your finalization code. 如果應用程式定義域或 CLR 正在關閉，您就無法可靠地存取任何具有最終處理方法，且靜態欄位所參考的物件。If either an application domain or the CLR is shutting down, you cannot reliably access any object that has a finalization method and that is referenced by a static field. 這是因為這些物件可能已完成。This is because these objects may have already been finalized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值的是特別針對目前的平台和.NET framework 實作自訂常數。The property value of is a constant customized specifically for the current platform and implementation of the .NET Framework. 如需有關屬性值的逸出字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[逸出字元](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information about the escape characters in the property value, see [Character Escapes](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md). 所提供的功能通常是代表什麼意思條款新行字元、 換行字元、 換行、 歸位字元、 CRLF、 和行尾。The functionality provided by is often what is meant by the terms newline, line feed, line break, carriage return, CRLF, and end of line. 可用於搭配逸出字元 '\r' 和 '\n' 在 Microsoft C# 和 C/c + + 等語言特有的新行字元支援或`vbCrLf`在 Microsoft Visual Basic。 can be used in conjunction with language-specific newline support such as the escape characters '\r' and '\n' in Microsoft C# and C/C++, or `vbCrLf` in Microsoft Visual Basic. 會自動附加至文字處理和方法。 is automatically appended to text processed by the and methods. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示三行以換行分隔。The following example displays three lines separated by newlines. summary.span: 取得含有目前平台識別項和版本號碼的 物件。

span.span: Gets an object that contains the current platform identifier and version number.

value.span: 包含平台識別項和版本號碼的物件。

span.span: An object that contains the platform identifier and version number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 從 Windows 8 開始屬性會傳回所有 Windows 平台的相同主要和次要版本號碼。Starting with Windows 8, the property returns the same major and minor version numbers for all Windows platforms. 因此，我們不建議您擷取這個屬性來判斷作業系統版本的值。Therefore, we do not recommend that you retrieve the value of this property to determine the operating system version. 一般而言，屬性用來確保應用程式某些基底版本引進特定功能的作業系統上執行。Typically, the property is used to ensure that an app is running on some base version of an operating system in which a particular feature was introduced. 這種情況時，您應該執行版本檢查，藉由測試所傳回目前的作業系統版本是否屬性是相同，或大於基礎作業系統版本。When this is the case, you should perform a version check by testing whether the current operating system version returned by the property is the same as, or greater than, the base operating system version. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別主題。For more information, see the class topic. 透過 Windows 8屬性會傳回 Windows 所報告的版本[GetVersionEx](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724451\(v=vs.85\).aspx)函式。Through Windows 8, the property returns the version reported by the Windows [GetVersionEx](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724451\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function. 如需 Windows 桌面作業系統版本和其對應的版本號碼的清單，請參閱[Operating System Version](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) Windows 開發人員中心。For a list of Windows desktop operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers, see [Operating System Version](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) in the Windows Dev Center. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會報告相同的版本號碼 (6.2.0.0) 兩者[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]和 Windows 10 的相同主要和次要版本號碼。The property reports the same version number (6.2.0.0) for both [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)] and the same major and minor version number for Windows 10. 在某些情況下，屬性可能不會傳回符合指定的 Windows 程式相容性模式功能版本的作業系統版本。In some cases, the property may not return the operating system version that matches the version specified for the Windows Program Compatibility mode feature. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的平台識別項和版本執行的程式碼範例的電腦數目。The following example displays the platform identifier and version number of the computer that runs the code example. [!code-cpp[environment.osversion#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.OSVersion/CPP/osversion.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.osversion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.OSVersion/CS/osversion.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.osversion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.OSVersion/VB/osversion.vb#1)]

span.span: Creates, modifies, or deletes an environment variable stored in the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法相當於呼叫值是多載如`target`引數。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the overload with a value of for the `target` argument. 如果`value`引數不是空白 （請參閱刪除環境變數在定義的值是空的本節稍後的討論） 和命名的環境變數`variable`參數不存在，環境建立並指派的內容變數`value`。If the `value` argument is not empty (see the discussion of deleting an environment variable later in this section for the definition of an empty value) and the environment variable named by the `variable` parameter does not exist, the environment variable is created and assigned the contents of `value`. 如果檔案存在，則會修改它的值。If it does exist, its value is modified. 環境變數在目前的處理序的環境區塊中定義的因為它不會保存之後處理程序已結束。Because the environment variable is defined in the environment block of the current process only, it does not persist after the process has ended. 如果`variable`包含非初始十六進位零字元之前的零個字元會被視為環境變數名稱和所有後續的字元會被忽略, 的字元。If `variable` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are considered the environment variable name and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`包含非初始十六進位零字元之前有零個字元指派給環境變數，而所有後續的字元會被忽略, 的字元。If `value` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are assigned to the environment variable and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`是空白且命名的環境變數`variable`存在，會刪除環境變數。If `value` is empty and the environment variable named by `variable` exists, the environment variable is deleted. 如果`variable`不存在，就會發生任何錯誤即使無法執行此作業。If `variable` does not exist, no error occurs even though the operation cannot be performed. `value` 即會視為空白任何下列情況：`value` is considered empty under any of the following conditions: - 它是`null`。It is `null`. - 它是。It is . - 它只包含單一字元，其值是 U + 0000。It consists of a single character whose value is U+0000. ## Examples 下列範例會測試名為的環境變數是否`APPDOMAIN`存在於目前的處理序。The following example tests whether an environment variable named `APPDOMAIN` exists in the current process. 如果沒有，它就會建立並設定其值為"True"。If it does not, it creates it and sets its value to "True". 如果值`APPDOMAIN`環境變數為"True"時，它會呼叫`Message.Display`新的應用程式定義域中的方法。If the value of the `APPDOMAIN` environment variable is "True", it calls the `Message.Display` method in a new application domain. 否則，它會執行`Message.Display`目前的應用程式定義域中的方法。Otherwise, it executes the `Message.Display` method in the current application domain. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.setenvironmentvariable/cs/setenvironmentvariable1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.setenvironmentvariable/vb/setenvironmentvariable1.vb#1)] 如果您第一次執行範例，訊息 「 Domain2 網域中的執行中 」 會顯示到主控台。If you run the example for the first time, the message "Executing in domain Domain2" displays to the console. 如果您使用命令，從命令列設定環境變數：If you set the environment variable from the command line by using the command: `Set AppDomain=False` 此範例會顯示訊息 「 定義域中執行*exeName*.exe"，其中*exeName*是可執行檔的名稱。the example displays the message "Executing in domain *exeName*.exe", where *exeName* is the name of the executable. 下列範例會嘗試擷取名為環境變數的值`Test1`從處理序的環境區塊。The following example attempts to retrieve the value of an environment variable named `Test1` from the process environment block. 如果變數不存在，此範例會建立的變數，並擷取其值。If the variable doesn't exist, the example creates the variable and retrieves its value. 此範例會顯示變數的值。The example displays the value of the variable. 如果範例已建立變數，它也會呼叫方法的每個成員列舉型別來建立可以擷取只會從目前的處理程序的環境區塊的變數。If the example created the variable, it also calls the method with each member of the enumeration to establish that the variable can be retrieved only from the current process environment block. 最後，如果範例已建立變數，就會刪除它。Finally, if the example created the variable, it deletes it. summary.span: 建立、修改或刪除儲存在目前的處理程序中，或是儲存在保留給目前使用者或本機電腦的 Windows 作業系統登錄機碼中的環境變數。

span.span: Creates, modifies, or deletes an environment variable stored in the current process or in the Windows operating system registry key reserved for the current user or local machine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您定義環境變數所提供的機器上執行的所有處理程序 (值)，由使用者所執行的所有處理程序 (值)，或目前的處理序 (值)。The method lets you define an environment variable that is available to all processes that run on a machine (the value), to all processes run by a user (the value), or to the current process (the value). 每部電腦和每個使用者環境變數會複製到目前的處理序的環境區塊。Per-machine and per-user environment variables are copied into the environment block of the current process. 不過，對目前處理序的環境區塊都是唯一的環境變數會保存在程序結束後才。However, environment variables that are unique to the current process environment block persist only until the process ends. 如果`value`引數不是空白 （請參閱刪除環境變數在定義的值是空的本節稍後的討論） 和命名的環境變數`variable`參數不存在，環境建立並指派的內容變數`value`。If the `value` argument is not empty (see the discussion of deleting an environment variable later in this section for the definition of an empty value) and the environment variable named by the `variable` parameter does not exist, the environment variable is created and assigned the contents of `value`. 如果檔案存在，則會修改它的值。If it does exist, its value is modified. 如果`variable`包含非初始十六進位零字元之前的零個字元會被視為環境變數名稱和所有後續的字元會被忽略, 的字元。If `variable` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are considered the environment variable name and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`包含非初始十六進位零字元之前有零個字元指派給環境變數，而所有後續的字元會被忽略, 的字元。If `value` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are assigned to the environment variable and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`是空白且命名的環境變數`variable`存在，會刪除環境變數。If `value` is empty and the environment variable named by `variable` exists, the environment variable is deleted. `value` 即會視為空白任何下列情況：`value` is considered empty under any of the following conditions: - 它是`null`。It is `null`. - 它是。It is . - 它只包含單一字元，其值是 U + 0000。It consists of a single character whose value is U+0000. 如果`variable`不存在，就會發生任何錯誤雖然無法執行此作業。If `variable` does not exist, no error occurs although the operation cannot be performed. 時請小心`target`是，因為您可以不小心刪除環境變數會影響整個本機電腦，不只是目前的處理序或使用者。Be careful when `target` is , because you can accidentally delete an environment variable that affects your entire local machine, not just the current process or user. 如果`target`是，HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment 機碼的本機電腦的登錄中儲存環境變數。If `target` is , the environment variable is stored in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment key of the local computer's registry. 它也會複製到 [檔案總管] 以目前使用者的身分執行的執行個體。It is also copied to instances of File Explorer that are running as the current user. 環境變數接著會由使用者從 [檔案總管] 啟動任何新處理序繼承。The environment variable is then inherited by any new processes that the user launches from File Explorer. 同樣地，如果`target`是，環境變數會儲存在本機電腦的登錄 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment 索引鍵。Similarly, if `target` is , the environment variable is stored in the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment key of the local computer's registry. 它也會複製到 [檔案總管] 中的所有執行個體。It is also copied to all instances of File Explorer. 然後從檔案總管 啟動任何新處理序繼承的環境變數。The environment variable is then inherited by any new processes that are launched from File Explorer. 如果`target`是或，其他應用程式都會收到通知，設定作業的 Windows`WM_SETTINGCHANGE`訊息。If `target` is or , other applications are notified of the set operation by a Windows `WM_SETTINGCHANGE` message. 如果`target`是或，我們建議的長度`value`小於 2048年個字元。If `target` is or , we recommend that the length of `value` be less than 2048 characters. ## Examples 下列範例會建立環境變數， ，和為目標時，會檢查作業系統登錄是否包含使用者和電腦的環境變數，然後刪除環境變數。The following example creates environment variables for the , , and targets, checks whether the operating system registry contains the user and machine environment variables, then deletes the environment variables. [!code-cpp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CS/gsev.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/VB/gsev.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得目前的堆疊追蹤資訊。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會列出依反向時間順序的方法呼叫，也就是最新的方法呼叫會首先，描述和一行的堆疊追蹤資訊會列出每個方法呼叫堆疊上。The property lists method calls in reverse chronological order, that is, the most recent method call is described first, and one line of stack trace information is listed for each method call on the stack. 不過，屬性可能不會報告為多個方法呼叫發生在最佳化期間發生的程式碼轉換。However, the property might not report as many method calls as expected due to code transformations that occur during optimization. > [!NOTE] > 對於由類別的堆疊追蹤資訊的階層式檢視，請使用類別。For a hierarchical view of the stack trace information by class, use the class. 屬性格式化每個方法呼叫的堆疊追蹤資訊，如下所示：The property formats the stack trace information for each method call as follows: 「 在`FullClassName`。`MethodName`(`MethodParams`) 中`FileName`： 列`LineNumber`""at `FullClassName`.`MethodName`(`MethodParams`) in `FileName` :line `LineNumber` " 常值"at"會加上三個空格，以及如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略整個開頭為"in"的子字串。The literal "at" is preceded by three spaces, and the entire substring starting with "in" is omitted if debug symbols are not available. 此預留位置， `FullClassName`， `MethodName`， `MethodParams`， `FileName`，和`LineNumber`、 以實際的值取代和定義方式如下：The placeholders, `FullClassName`, `MethodName`, `MethodParams`, `FileName`, and `LineNumber`, are replaced by actual values, and are defined as follows: FullClassNameFullClassName 類別，包括命名空間的完整名稱。The full name of the class, including the namespace. `MethodName` 方法的名稱。The name of the method. `MethodParams` 參數類型/名稱組的清單。The list of parameter type/name pairs. 每一組以逗號分隔 （"，"）。Each pair is separated by a comma (","). 如果，則會忽略這項資訊`MethodName`不採用任何參數。This information is omitted if `MethodName` takes no parameters. `FileName` 檔案的來源名稱`MethodName`方法宣告。The name of the source file where the `MethodName` method is declared. 如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略這項資訊。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available. `LineNumber` 在行號`FileName`，其中包含從原始程式碼`MethodName`呼叫堆疊上的指示。The number of the line in `FileName` that contains the source code from `MethodName` for the instruction that is on the call stack. 如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略這項資訊。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available. 字串終止堆疊追蹤的每一行。The string terminates each line of the stack trace. ## Examples 下列範例會示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[environment.stacktrace#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.StackTrace/CPP/stacktrace.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.stacktrace#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.StackTrace/CS/stacktrace.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.stacktrace#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.StackTrace/VB/stacktrace.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得系統啟動後經過的毫秒數。

span.span: Gets the number of milliseconds elapsed since the system started.

value.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，包含自上一次電腦啟動後所經過的毫秒時間量。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer containing the amount of time in milliseconds that has passed since the last time the computer was started.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值衍生自系統計時器，而且會儲存為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。The value of this property is derived from the system timer and is stored as a 32-bit signed integer. 請注意，因為它衍生自系統計時器，解析屬性僅限於系統計時器，通常是在 10 到 16 毫秒為單位的範圍內的解析度。Note that, because it is derived from the system timer, the resolution of the property is limited to the resolution of the system timer, which is typically in the range of 10 to 16 milliseconds. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為值屬性值會是 32 位元帶正負號的整數，如果系統會連續執行，會增加應用程式從零到大約 24.9 天，然後跳到，這是負數，然後遞增回下一個 24.9 指定天數內的零。Because the value of the property value is a 32-bit signed integer, if the system runs continuously, will increment from zero to for approximately 24.9 days, then jump to , which is a negative number, then increment back to zero during the next 24.9 days. 您可以暫時解決此問題，經由呼叫 Windows [GetTickCount](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724408.aspx)函式，會重設為零，或藉由呼叫之後大約隔 49.7 天才[GetTickCount64](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724411.aspx)函式。You can work around this issue by calling the Windows [GetTickCount](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724408.aspx) function, which resets to zero after approximately 49.7 days, or by calling the [GetTickCount64](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724411.aspx) function. 不同於屬性，這是 1/1/0001，上午 12:00 起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數。 is different from the property, which is the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 1/1/0001, 12:00am. 使用屬性，以取得目前的本地日期和時間，在此電腦上的。Use the property to obtain the current local date and time on this computer. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取傳回值的正數範圍屬性。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the positive range of values returned by the property. 屬性之間的循環，這是負數，和每 49.8 天。The property cycles between , which is a negative number, and once every 49.8 days. 此程式碼範例會移除以產生零之間循環的非負數數字的正負號位元和每 24.9 天。This code sample removes the sign bit to yield a nonnegative number that cycles between zero and once every 24.9 days. [!code-cpp[environment.tickcount#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/CPP/tickcount.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.tickcount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/CS/tickcount.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.tickcount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/VB/tickcount.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得與目前使用者相關聯的網路網域名稱。

span.span: Gets the network domain name associated with the current user.

value.span: 與目前使用者相關聯的網路網域名稱。

span.span: The network domain name associated with the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者的網域帳戶認證會格式化為使用者的網域名稱，'\\' 字元，而且使用者名稱。The domain account credentials for a user are formatted as the user's domain name, the '\\' character, and user name. 使用屬性，以取得使用者的網域名稱，不含使用者名稱，而屬性，以取得不含網域名稱的使用者名稱。Use the property to obtain the user's domain name without the user name, and the property to obtain the user name without the domain name. 例如，如果使用者的網域名稱和使用者名稱是 CORPORATENETWORK\john，屬性會傳回"CORPORATENETWORK"。For example, if a user's domain name and user name are CORPORATENETWORK\john, the property returns "CORPORATENETWORK". 屬性第一次嘗試取得目前使用者的 Windows 帳戶名稱的網域名稱元件。The property first attempts to get the domain name component of the Windows account name for the current user. 如果該嘗試失敗時，這個屬性會嘗試取得與所提供的使用者名稱相關聯的網域名稱屬性。If that attempt fails, this property attempts to get the domain name associated with the user name provided by the property. 如果該嘗試失敗，因為主機電腦未加入網域，則會傳回主機電腦的名稱。If that attempt fails because the host computer is not joined to a domain, then the host computer name is returned.

span.span: The user name of the person who is logged on to Windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來識別目前的執行緒，可基於安全性或存取應用程式與系統上的使用者。You can use the property to identify the user on the current thread, to the system and application for security or access purposes. 也可用以自訂特定應用程式的每個使用者。It can also be used to customize a particular application for each user. 屬性會包裝 Windows 呼叫[GetUserName](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724432.aspx)函式。The property wraps a call to the Windows [GetUserName](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724432.aspx) function. 使用者的網域帳戶認證會格式化為使用者的網域名稱，'\\' 字元，而且使用者名稱。The domain account credentials for a user are formatted as the user's domain name, the '\\' character, and user name. 使用屬性，以取得使用者的網域名稱和屬性，以取得使用者名稱。Use the property to obtain the user's domain name and the property to obtain the user name. 如果在開發環境中，執行 ASP.NET 應用程式屬性會傳回目前使用者的名稱。If an ASP.NET application runs in a development environment, the property returns the name of the current user. 在已發行的 ASP.NET 應用程式，這個屬性會傳回應用程式集區帳戶 （例如預設應用程式集區） 的名稱。In a published ASP.NET application, this property returns the name of the application pool account (such as Default AppPool). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示啟動目前的執行緒之人員的使用者名稱。The following example displays the user name of the person who started the current thread. [!code-cpp[Environment.UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.UserName/CPP/username.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.UserName/CS/username.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.UserName/VB/username.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得描述通用語言執行平台的主要、次要、組建 (Build) 和修訂編號的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that describes the major, minor, build, and revision numbers of the common language runtime.

value.span: 顯示 Common Language Runtime 版本的物件。

span.span: An object that displays the version of the common language runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對 .NET Framework 4、4.5、4.5.1 和 4.5.2 版， 屬性會傳回 物件，其字串表示的格式為 `4.0.30319.xxxxx`。For the .NET Framework Versions 4, 4.5, 4.5.1, and 4.5.2, the property returns a object whose string representation has the form `4.0.30319.xxxxx`. 在.NET Framework 4.6 和更新版本，它有表單`4.0.30319.42000`。For the .NET Framework 4.6 and later versions, it has the form `4.0.30319.42000`. > [!WARNING] > 如[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]和更新版本中，我們不建議使用無法偵測到的執行階段則版本屬性相反地，您可以藉由查詢登錄判斷 common language runtime 的版本。For the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] and later, we do not recommend using the property to detect the version of the runtime; instead, you can determine the version of the common language runtime by querying the registry. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 判斷安裝的.NET Framework 版本是](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/how-to-determine-which-versions-are-installed.md)。For more information, see [How to: Determine Which .NET Framework Versions Are Installed](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/how-to-determine-which-versions-are-installed.md). 如需安裝.NET Framework 的每個版本的 common language runtime 版本的詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information about the version of the common language runtime that is installed with each version of the .NET Framework, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例顯示 common language runtime 的版本。The following example displays the version of the common language runtime. （基於安全性理由，範例輸出中會省略版本）。(The version is omitted from the example output for security reasons.) [!code-cpp[Environment.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.Version/CPP/version.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.Version/CS/version.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.Version/VB/version.vb#1)]
